DOC.brief_summary: Comparison Breathing pattern mechanical ventilation . Two mode mechanical ventilation compare ( Pressure Support Ventilation Neurally Adjusted Ventilatory Assist )
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Breathing Pattern During Neurally Adjusted Ventilatory Assist Ventilation Pressure Support Ventilation
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility : healthy subject without respiratory complication past Subjects breath spontaneously without mechanical ventilation , Pressure Support Ventilation Neurally Adjusted Ventilatory Assist . Three level pressurisation test : 5 cmH2O , 8 cmH2O 12 cmH2O Duration condition 15 minute . Measurements include : Flow , airway pressure , SaO2 , PtCO2 , diaphragmatic electromyography , chest wall motion optoelectronic plethysmography
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Healthy Subject without chronic disease Absence consent Pregnant
